scripts.build:cf: npx --yes @cloudflare/next-on-pages@1 && if [ -n "$SENTRY_AUTH_TOKEN" ] && [ -n "$SENTRY_ORG" ] && [ -n "$SENTRY_PROJECT" ]; then npx --yes @sentry/cli sourcemaps upload --validate --rewrite --debug-id-reference --url-prefix "~" .vercel/output/static/_next/static .vercel/output/static/_worker.js; else echo "[sentry] skip sourcemap upload (missing env)"; fi
